channel.title: [PI] npc vs npc

item.title: [PI] npc vs npc
item.dc:creator: @E_d_e_n1 E_d_e_n
item.description:
@E_d_e_n1 wrote:

ive got summoning, and with the npc vs npc if i edit or take out if(p == null || n == null) { System.out.println("p/n = null"); return; }

[code]public static void Attack(NPC p, NPC n) {
try {

//checks if we can att enemy
if(p == null || n == null) {
System.out.println(“p/n = null”);
return;
}

	if(p.isDead == true) {
		//p.Attacking = false;
		return;
	}
	if (n.isDead == true) {
	return;
	}

	MeleeAttack(p, n);
		
	} catch(Exception e) {
	}

}[/code]
would that allow for npc’s to fight npc’s in non multi?
and if i added a if inwild return into that would that also stop them attacking in the wild?

Read full topic
